text:
@atrupar Reuters
FRI FEB 28, 2020 / 10:38 AM EST
Explainer: “Coronavirus reappears in discharged patients, raising questions in containment fight.”
So China is reporting patients who test  negative twice are sometimes readmitted as positive again... so great job dad.😫
